title: Assign Daily Tasks
description: A shift supervisor needs to assign restocking and cleaning tasks to associates for the current shift.

tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor accesses the task assignment tool.

tasks.description: Create a new task for 'Restock beverage cooler' and assign it to a specific associate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task is created and assigned to the correct employee.

tasks.description: Review the list of all assigned tasks for the shift to ensure workload is balanced.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor confirms that tasks are distributed evenly among the available staff.
